s2.message: Fixed: Should not use predictable CSS classes (bug 17561)

s1.message: IAdblockPlus interface removed to avoid detection, other extensions have to access JavaScript object directly now

s6.message: K-Meleon: Removed useless “Show in toolbar” option from toolbar icon’s context menu

s5.message: K-Meleon: Middle-click on the status bar icon now disables/re-enables Adblock Plus (K-Meleon 1.1 or higher only)

s4.message: K-Meleon: Added context menu to the status bar icon (K-Meleon 1.1 or higher only)
